actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Interstate Commerce Commission to investigate certain interstate freight rates, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Interstate Commerce Commission to investigate rail freight rates between Texas and Chicago and Florida and Chicago for manufactured products, agricultural commodities, and raw materials and to remove any undue advantages found in such rates.

titles.title: A bill to require the Interstate Commerce Commission to investigate certain interstate freight rates, and for other purposes.
